name: Tesco Organic 6 British Free Range Pork Sausages 325G
description: Juicy organic sausages made with prime cuts of British pork from pigs reared on certified organic land and feed at Tesco quality assured farms. Farms supplying our pork are all recognised by national farm assurance schemes with standards of quality, animal husbandry and welfare informed by the Tesco Livestock Code of Practice.   Oven cook or grill for 3 people. Try one of our popular pork recipes at www.tesco.com/realfood
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Oven><Temperature F="Fan 170°C" G="Gas 5" C="190°C" /><Time>25 - 30 mins</Time><Instructions>Place on a baking tray in the centre of a pre-heated oven for 25-30 minutes. Turn occasionally.</Instructions></Oven><Microwave><Item23 LineNumber="1" Step="" T650="" T750="" T850="" /></Microwave><Barbeque /><Grill><Time>14 - 21 mins</Time><Temperature_Setting>Medium</Temperature_Setting><Instructions>Place under a pre-heated, medium grill for 14-21 minutes. Turn occasionally.</Instructions></Grill><Shallow_Fry /><Deep_Fry /><Stir_Fry /><Steam /><Poach /><Hob /><Boil_In_The_Bag /><Oven_From_Frozen><Temperature F="" G="" C="" /></Oven_From_Frozen><Microwave_From_Frozen><Item24 LineNumber="1" Step="" T650="" T750="" T850="" /></Microwave_From_Frozen><Cooking_Precautions>All appliances vary these are guidelines only.Tesco recommends that all meat products are cooked thoroughly.Remove all packaging.For best results do not prick sausage skins.Not suitable for microwave cooking.Not suitable for cooking from frozen.</Cooking_Precautions></Cooking_Instructions><Freezing_Instructions><Freezing_Guidelines>Suitable for home freezing. Ideally freeze as soon as possible after purchase but always by 'use by' date shown.Use within one month.</Freezing_Guidelines><Defrosting>Once defrosted, do not refreeze.Defrost thoroughly for a minimum of 12 hours in the refrigerator.Follow the preparation guidelines above.</Defrosting></Freezing_Instructions>
ingredients: Organic Breadcrumb (Wheat Flour (Wheat Flour, Calcium Carbonate, Iron, Niacin, Thiamin), Salt, Yeast)
Filled into natural non-organic pork casings
